title: [Yoram Gross Films film posters]
brief_description: Reproductions of posters for Yoram Gross animated films: “Art Alive” ; “The Adventures of Blinky Bill” ; “Blinky Bill’s Extraordinary Adventures” ; “Flipper & Lopaka” ; “Old Tom” ; “Samuel & Nina” ; “Skippy” ; “Tabaluga” ; “Dot and the Kangaroo” ; “Epic” ; “Joseph the Dreamer” ; “The Seventh Match” ; “The Camel Boy” ; “The Little Convict” ; “The Magic Riddle” ; “Blinky Bill’s White Christmas”.
